page.title: 12Trade
page.content: The present day trade in Furnace Green is based on the shopping parade (C1). Like all Crawley neighbourhoods ther is a wide range of local shops. These include:a bakery, butchers, foodstore, greengrocers, hardware store, fish and chip shop, newsagent, off licence, video club and hairdressers. There are opportunities for recreation in this area .In Laurel Close there is the Shrublands Residents Club which incorperates a play group and has its own tennis courts.Furnace Green Community Centre is near Norwich Road and is used for all kinds of sport Outdoor activities are catered for by playing fields and a municipal Golf course.Local transport is provided by the Green line buses which take people to Crawley Town centre where ther are excellent links with rail and road.
